生徒会長、わざわざねぎらいに来てくれたのか。: Did the student council president come all the way here to thank me?
ええ。ここまで公式戦が盛り上がったのは、久しぶりですからね。: Yes. It's been a long time since the official match was this exciting.
今回の試合の結果は、興味深いものでした。: The results of this match were very interesting.
シリウスシュガーの用いた戦術はまさしく奇策と言うべきもの。\n次に同じ結果をもた:
The tactics Sirius Sugaru used were truly a strange plan.
It will be difficult to achieve the same result next time.
また、カオスメイデン側に慢心があったことも否定出来ません。: Also, I can't deny that Chaos Maiden's side was conceited.
ですが、それを踏まえても、シリウスシュガーの皆さんが\n並々ならぬ努力をされた結:
But even taking that into account, everyone in Sirius Sugaru
It was clear at a glance that this was the result of her extraordinary efforts.
見ていた皆さんにも、伝わったはずです。: I'm sure everyone who saw it understood.
じゃあ、シリウスシュガーの解散や退学処分は？: So what about disbanding and expulsion of Sirius Sugaru?
ええ……！\nまたこれからも、シリウスシュガーでいられるんですね……！:
Yes...!
I'll be able to stay in Sirius Sugar again...!
はい！ ５人一緒です！！: Yes! The five of us are together!!
ったく、こんなんでクビとかありえないから。: Geez, there's no way I could get fired like this.
……安心した。みんなのおかげ。: ...I'm relieved. It's all thanks to everyone.
そうだね。ひとりの力じゃない。\nあたしたちみんなと、%usernameuser:
That's right. It's not just one person's power.
It's the power of us all and %usernameusernameuserna%.
俺は文句言ってただけだからな。実際に動いたのは、お前達だ。: I was just complaining, after all. You're the ones who actually moved.
うん、それはそう。最初の方とか、ひどかったし。\nどこの鬼軍曹かって。:
Yeah, that's right. The first one was terrible.
What demon sergeant?
んな、ムチいるかー！ ……って言いたいところだけど、\nまあ、役には立ったから、:
Wha, you got a whip?! ...Or so I'd like to say, but...
Well, it was useful, so I'll let you go without 'love'.
なんだよ、それ。: What the hell is that supposed to mean?
フッ……すっかりメンバーとも馴染んだようですね。: Heh... Looks like you've gotten used to the members.
（言われてみれば、記憶喪失の俺が彼女たちと出会って、\nまだそんなに経ってないん:
(Now that she mentions it, I met the girls because I had amnesia
It hasn't been that long...)
それが、こうして気楽に冗談を言えるぐらいに馴染めているのだから、\nありがたい話:
That’s why I’m so used to being able to joke around so casually like this,
I'm grateful for that.
もっとも、肝心の記憶は全然思い出せないんだけど……: Then again, I can't remember the most important memories at all...
いや。嬉しいさ。記憶をなくしてる俺だが……\nここが俺の居場所だって気がした。:
No, I'm happy. I've lost my memories, but...
I felt like this was where I belonged.
え？ あ？ いや、そう思ってるの、もしかして俺だけ？: Huh? Oh? Wait, am I the only one who thinks that?
もう、とっくにみんなそのつもりだよ。: That's what everyone's been planning for a long time now.
はいっ！ %usernameusernameuserna%さんも\nシリウスシュ:
Yes! %usernameusernameuserna%san too.
I'm an irreplaceable member of Sirius Sugaru!!
ですから、これからもよろしくお願いします！！: So, I look forward to working with you from now on!!
……ああ、ありがとうな。そしてこちらこそ、よろしく。: ...Yeah, thanks. And it's nice to meet you too.
こうして、俺の指揮官としての新たな人生がスタートした。\n新たな仲間として迎え入:
And so, my new life as commander began.
Along with the girls who welcomed her as a new comrade.
